resource.displayName: J.Watanabe, H.Wakaguri1, M.Sasaki1, Y.Suzuki1, S.Sugano1 P. yoelii 17XL predicted full length transcripts

manualGet.institution: Department of Parasitology, Institute of Medical Science, University of Tokyo

resource.pluginArgs: --sourceIdRegex "\|(\w+\(\S+\))$" --fastaFile @downloadDir@/WatanabePy17XL_PredictedTranscripts/reffull_py.fas --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --externalDatabaseVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --SOTermName 'transcript' --ncbiTaxId 352914 --libraryVector 'pME18SFL3' --contactName 'Junichi Watanabe' --contactAddress1 "Institute of Medical Science; The University of Tokyo, Department of Parasitology" --contactAddress2 "4-6-1, Shirokanedai, Minatoku, Tokyo 108-8639, Japan" --putativeFullLength --libraryName 'derivedFromWatanabePy17XL' --libraryDesc "Predicted full length transcript sequence produced after BLAT alignment of the WatanabePy17XL EST library sequences to the genome and correction of the cDNA sequences using annotated gene sequences."
resource.description: P. yoelii 17XL predicted full length transcript sequences.

resource.displayName: J.Watanabe, H.Wakaguri1, M.Sasaki1, Y.Suzuki1, S.Sugano1 P. yoelii 17XL EST library

manualGet.institution: Department of Parasitology, Institute of Medical Science, University of Tokyo

resource.pluginArgs: --sourceIdRegex "\|(\w+)$" --fastaFile @downloadDir@/WatanabePy17XL_EstLibrary/onepass_py.fas --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --externalDatabaseVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --SOTermName 'EST' --ncbiTaxId 352914 --libraryVector 'pME18SFL3' --contactName 'Junichi Watanabe' --contactAddress1 "Institute of Medical Science; The University of Tokyo, Department of Parasitology" --contactAddress2 "4-6-1, Shirokanedai, Minatoku, Tokyo 108-8639, Japan" --libraryName 'WatanabePy17XL' --libraryDesc "P. yoelii 17XL (XPYw) and P. yoelii 17XNL (XPYs) were propagated in vivo in five-week old female ICR mice. Blood was filtrated through Plamsodipur filter to remove white blood cells."

resource.description: Annotation of the P. yoelii 17XNL genome obtained from Jane Carlton (TIGR), 2005-09-01. Includes gene models and predicted protein translations.

resource.displayName: P. yoelii, EC Numbers for Annotation
resource.pluginArgs: --ECMappingFile @downloadDir@/Pyoelii_EC_numbers/ec_numbers.txt --evidenceCode "Annotation Center" --aaSeqLocusTagMappingSql "SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.GeneFeature g, dots.Transcript t, dots.TranslatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.source_id = ? AND g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id"

resource.displayName: P. yoelii (17XNL) provisional annotations from Stephen Kappe
resource.extDbName: P. yoelii Provisional Annotations from Kappe
resource.extDbRlsDescrip: P. yoelii Provisional Annotations from Kappe|2009-03-25
resource.unpack: dumpSequencesFromTable.pl --outputFile @downloadDir@/P.yoelii_Kappe_Annotation/Pyoelii.fasta --idSQL "SELECT enas.source_id, enas.sequence FROM dots.externalnasequence enas, sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr where enas.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name = 'Jane Carlton P. yoelii chromosomes' AND edr.version = '2002-09-10'"
resource.pluginArgs: --extDbName %EXT_DB_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --mapFile @gusHome@/lib/xml/isf/PlasmoDB/PyoeliiGffFeatures2gus.xml --inputFileOrDir @downloadDir@/P.yoelii_Kappe_Annotation/PyoeliiKappe_fixed.gff --fileFormat gff2 --gff2GroupTag "GenePrediction" --soCvsVersion @soVer@ --defaultOrganism "Plasmodium yoelii yoelii str. 17XNL" --handlerExternalDbs "enzyme:enzymeDB:2009-02-11" --seqSoTerm "contig" --naSequenceSubclass ExternalNASequence --seqIdColumn source_id --seqExtDbName "Jane Carlton P. yoelii chromosomes" --seqExtDbRlsVer "2002-09-10" --validationLog @pipelineDir@/logs/PyoeliiKappe.validation.log --bioperlTreeOutput @pipelineDir@/logs/PyoeliiKappe.bioperl
resource.description: Annotation of the P. yoelii 17XNL genome obtained from Stephen Kappe, 2009-03-25. Includes gene models inferred from orthology.

Phylogenetic profiles based on the presence or absence of all known P. yoelii ORFs in 195 completely sequenced genomes were calculated. Similarity between profiles is a good indicator of functional linkages between proteins (see Pellegrini et al., 1999). Data on ORFs with the most similar profiles to a given query ORF is also available, and can be used to establish the function of uncharacterized ORFs, based on the similarity of their profiles (see Date and Marcotte, 2003) with ORFs of known function.

resource.displayName: Phylogenetic profiles for P. yoelii (mutual information scores)
resource.description: Mutual information, an entropy based, information theoretic measure, was used to measure similarity between phylogenetic profiles. This measure is more sensitive, and can detect inverse or non-linear relationships, as opposed to using simpler metrics such as Pearson correlation (Date and Marcotte, 2003).

description: Mass Spec of P. yoelii proteins identified in liver stage-infected hepatocytes isolated 40 hrs post-infection (LS40).

resource.displayName: Mass Spec of parasite proteins identified in LS-infected hepatocytes isolated 50 hrs post-infection (LS50)
